divs: Sighting Detailsi stepped out side to smoke a cigertte cuz i didnt smoke in the house took probley 3 puffs off my cigertte and looked up and saw this huge triangle with huge lights on each corner and one right in the middle i opened the door and was yelling at my girl friend to come see and she was to scared to even look by the tone of my voice i guess and it was moving from west to east real slow looked like it should have fell out the sky and it made no noise what so ever and iam not sure on the date but i do know that it was,april or may i believe it was and the time of night was about right it made the hair on the back of my neck stand up wish i would have had my camara but i didnt and i couldnt take my eyes off of it i could even see structure of the craft it looked like the triangles i have seen on the internet i have also seen other objects through my life proubley about 9 or so for many years iam 46 years old and ive seen stuff as far back as a teen and most recent ones was up in charlevoix county seen two sightings up there in a 5 year spand also seen a cigar shaped ufo when i was leaving work going from charlevoix to central lake michigan it was a very cloudy night and the clouds where low and soon as i was leaving the city of charlevoix i saw a cigar shaped object drop below the clouds with about 6 windows or so and the light that was coming out of those windows was real bright and it made no noise either dropped out of the clouds for about 20 seconds or so then it went back up into the clouds and that was back in summer 2006 i think
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Boyne City
There were no other sightings in Boyne City on or around May 15th 2009
Summary: triangle flew over the house real slow with no noise barley above the trees
